definitions: the action of making a hole in something by boring with a drill

examples.text: the windows vibrated all day from the sound of drilling

shortDefinitions: action of making hole in something by boring with drill

definitions: the action of sinking a borehole in order to obtain oil or water
shortDefinitions: action of sinking borehole in order to obtain oil or water

definitions: the action of cutting away part of a tooth before filling it

examples.text: some new dental technologies have eliminated the use of drilling

shortDefinitions: action of cutting away part of tooth before filling it

definitions: instruction or training in military exercises

examples.text: our days often began with military drilling

shortDefinitions: instruction or training in military exercises

definitions: the action of planting the ground in furrows

examples.text: accurate ridging and drilling make hoeing much easier

shortDefinitions: action of planting ground in furrows
